name: ABPersonViewControllerDelegate
desc: The ABPersonViewControllerDelegate protocol declares the interface that must be implemented by ABPersonViewController delegates.DeprecatedUse CNContactViewController instead.

items.name: func personViewController(ABPersonViewController, shouldPerformDefaultActionForPerson: ABRecord, property: ABPropertyID, identifier: ABMultiValueIdentifier) -> Bool
items.desc: Sent when the user selects a property value of the person displayed in a person view controller.
